page.title: 11Blisland School
page.content: Blisland School was built in 1880 . The school now has 9 infants, 3 boys and 6 girls. The junior end has 21 pupils, 8 boys and 13 girls. The school now has 2 teachers for 30 pupils,3 playgrounds,the infants, anybodys and the juniors. At 12.00 o'clock noon nearly everbody goes down to the canteen for lunch. After lunch if the weather is fine we go down on the playingfield which is behind the canteen. The bell goes at the end of all the playtimes. These are some of the lessons we do at school Maths, Singing, English, PE, Games, Reading and Storywriting. Every Friday we go swimming in the pool. Then on Wednesday some of us go to Music Centre in Bodmin.
